title: Swarna Rekha: Antique Finish Peacock Nakshi Necklace (Addigai)
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Antique Hyderabadi Polish. Features round brilliant cut CZ diamonds
and Emeralds. Meticulously crafted setting for each gemstone.
features: Exquisite Nakshi work showcasing intricately detailed peacocks. Temple jewelry design with a central pendant featuring a prominent Emerald. Delicate floral motifs adorn the necklace chain. Gold ghungroo (గుళ్ళు) dangles add a touch of traditional charm.
colors: Antique gold finish with vibrant red rubies and green emerald accents. The clear CZ diamonds provide a stunning contrast and enhance the overall brilliance.
occasions: and Dussehra (దసరా). Also suitable for formal events and cultural celebrations.
description: This Addigai Haaram is a timeless piece of South Indian heritage. The intricate Nakshi work and temple design reflect skilled craftsmanship passed down through generations. The use of high-quality gold and gemstones ensures lasting beauty and value. It's a statement piece that will be treasured for years to come, adding a touch of regal elegance to any outfit.
